author: A_Brickset_user
title: vrooooooom
review: Nice little plane, also red. I did not know the plane had a name. The pilot is very nice, dressed in yellow with a cap and goggles on. Lots of swoosh, and if you try really hard you can put 3 people (or 2 animals) on the wings, like acrobats. It's a very simple plane but it gives a lot of plessure to my daughter. (and I get to build her an airstrip with the little radar!!)Great fun for a little red plane
